content:
Just got this clash in Reverse, and it was such a wonderful experience. :) Brava!

Giving the swappable-pairs in the stub generator was a nice touch. Solved in under 2 minutes, but I had a great time. :)

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: very powerfull
In "Reverse" mode, I fear we will not have the statement and so we will not have the letters that needs to be inverted. But it can be hinted from the tests anyway.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I love it.

Nice easy puzzle. I didn't realise there were so many reversable characters and did a switch with 22 cases instead of a smarter solution with string manipulation, but still got a solution in around 5 minutes.

It is a little strange not knowing the width of the lines beforehand (which would allow for more different approaches to the puzzle), I hope there's no language where that's a problem.

Btw, those tests/validators look great, very high effort. o/

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement.

Cases
Please add more cases:
* Characters missing from tests: L
* Characters missing from validators: V ^ W m i 9 6 E

Thanks.
I haven't tested it but I like the concept! +1
Thanks, fixed with additional Test/Validator (I believe)

Thanks.

Yes, it took me forever to write a program to create the art, so that it was somewhat random, but also maintained a pattern.
I put them in statement of stub :)
